name: Magic Pad 2
description:
Magic Pad is the ultimate Launchpad simulation app that allows you to perform cool beats and make awesome songs from our EDM track library.

HOW TO PLAY:
Magic Pad has 3 gameplay modes to fit players of all levels. Even Launchpad newbies will have a great time playing this app.

» Practice Mode: create awesome beats easily with Magic Pad. Tap on the drum pads as the color light fill them up.

» Remix Mode: remix your own hit songs with countless Sound Effect Packs - SFX. This mode also allows you to upload your favorite songs and become an awesome DJ. Remember to share your tracks with players worldwide!

» Collab Mode: Collaborate with friends and fans around the world to make unique remixes.

GAME FEATURES:
» Free trendy song packs with regular updates.
» Keep up with beat makers you follow and discover new content daily.
» High-quality samples (uncompressed 16-bit, 44.1 KHz).
» Many SFX in different genres: EDM, Rock, Pop, Country...
» Music session recording and sharing.
